Text: I have Win7 x64 and this one (like previous) doesn't work. I don't know what the fuck is going on but I have never had any problems until last couple releases. And yes, I have disabled internet access and run patch as admin.
Uninstall anydvd, then restart your PC and delete the folder anydvd from documents.. Now apply the patch
Uninstall anydvd, then restart your PC and delete the folder anydvd from documents, if there. Now install the program, restart pc and apply the patch
Work good Thanks. When uninstalling old anydvd use fox killer V.9 to clean out the left over files. Re boot install anydvd with internet turned off then apply the patch. Mine worked then

works fine on 64 bit, not really sure what the DEP is or how that works, but I followed the instructions and added it to list or whatever it said to do.  Is it necessary to do this though and if you don't do it, then what does it do?
